Title: Pharmacological interventions for pain for life-limiting conditions in children and adolescents
Abstract: © 2013 The Cochrane Collaboration.This is the protocol for a review and there is no abstract. The objectives are as follows: To evaluate the evidence on the effectiveness of different pharmacological interventions used for pain in CYP with LLC.
